name: GPTPullRequestReview
description: This task use OpenAi GPT model to review PullRequests
author: Steven Hoang

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api key of OpenAi or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: base_url
inputs.label: Base url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The base api url of OpenAi, Azure OpenAI or any OpenAPI compatible endpoint (optional).

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: OpenAI model
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OpenAI model to use. not used if you use Azure OpenAI. if no model is selected, the GPT 3.5 Turbo model is used.

inputs.name: includes
inputs.label: Includes
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-separated list of file extensions to include in the review. If left blank, all changed files will be included (optional).

inputs.name: excludes
inputs.label: Excludes
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-separated list of file extensions to exclude in the review. (optional).
